text:
tar reports:

tar: Invalid header, starting valid header search.
tar: End of archive volume 1 reached

Not all files are extracted.

A work-around is to use gtar from the Fink project,
for example.
creator: djun.kim@cielosystems.com

text:
The website from which most people download the tar files has a warning about this

http://jakarta.apache.org/ant/bindownload.cgi

"Ant is distributed as zip, tar.gz and tar.bz2 archives - the contents are the
same. Please note that the tar.* archives contain file names longer than 100
characters and have been created using GNU tar extensions. Thus they must be
untarred with a GNU compatible version of tar."

Since we need > 100 character paths, non-GNU versions of tar are not suitable.
creator: conor@apache.org
